title: JAKE E. LEE Shot Multiple Times In Las Vegas, Expected To Recover
description: Of Ozzy Osbourne and Red Dragon Cartel fame.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: Of Ozzy Osbourne and Red Dragon Cartel fame.
text: Jake E. Lee – known for his guitar work in Ozzy Osbourne, Badlands, and Red Dragon Cartel – has been shot multiple times in Las Vegas, NV. According to a statement from Lee's PR firm ABC PR, Lee is currently being treated in an intensive care unit and is doing well. The incident is currently being investigated by police. We wish Lee all the best at this time. The following is a statement from ABC PR: "As confirmed by management, legendary rock guitarist Jake E. Lee (Ozzy Osbourne, Badlands, Red Dragon Cartel) was shot multiple times early this morning in a Las Vegas, NV street shooting. Lee is fully conscious and doing well in an intensive care unit at a Las Vegas hospital. He is expected to fully recover. "Las Vegas authorities believe the shooting was completely random and occurred while Lee took his dog out for a walk in the early morning hours. As the incident is under police investigation, no further comments will be forthcoming. Lee and his family appreciate respecting their privacy at this time." Want More Metal? html:
Jake E. Lee – known for his guitar work in Ozzy Osbourne, Badlands, and Red Dragon Cartel – has been shot multiple times in Las Vegas, NV. According to a statement from Lee's PR firm ABC PR, Lee is currently being treated in an intensive care unit and is doing well. The incident is currently being investigated by police.

We wish Lee all the best at this time. The following is a statement from ABC PR:

"As confirmed by management, legendary rock guitarist Jake E. Lee (Ozzy Osbourne, Badlands, Red Dragon Cartel) was shot multiple times early this morning in a Las Vegas, NV street shooting. Lee is fully conscious and doing well in an intensive care unit at a Las Vegas hospital. He is expected to fully recover.

"Las Vegas authorities believe the shooting was completely random and occurred while Lee took his dog out for a walk in the early morning hours. As the incident is under police investigation, no further comments will be forthcoming. Lee and his family appreciate respecting their privacy at this time."
